html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-03602021-04-30,  ,  ,  ,  ,  CIRNAC, 
ActGwich'in Land Claim Settlement Act
SubjectGwich'in Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement
PrecisOrder consenting to amending the GWICH'IN COMPREHENSIVE LAND CLAIM AGREEMENT by replacing section 20.3.1 of the Agreement by removing the words “in the opinion of government” that has been agreed to by the Gwich’in Tribal Council, the Government of Canada and the Government of the Northwest Territories and to ensure consistency with recent changes to the Mackenzie Valley Resource Management Act.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Gwich'in Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement
precis: Order consenting to amending the GWICH'IN COMPREHENSIVE LAND CLAIM AGREEMENT by replacing section 20.3.1 of the Agreement by removing the words “in the opinion of government” that has been agreed to by the Gwich’in Tribal Council, the Government of Canada and the Government of the Northwest Territories and to ensure consistency with recent changes to the Mackenzie Valley Resource Management Act.
